channel.title: How i make pest control funzone?
channel.description:
Hey i'm using deltascape base.
How do i make u dont lose stuff in pest control because i am adding npc's but if the npc kills u i want it so u dont lose stuff.
Thanks, defeat.

item.title: How i make pest control funzone?
item.dc:creator: @str_rockstar str rockstar
item.description:
@str_rockstar wrote:

look for

        // If killed apply dead

and replace that whole thing with this

[code] // If killed apply dead
if ((absX >= XCORD && absX <= XCORD && absY >= YCORD && absY <= YCORD

&& IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1)) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]),
playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
teleportToX = XCORD;
teleportToY = YCORD;
sendMessage(“MESSAGE”);
}

    else if (IsDead == true && NewHP <= 1) {
        refreshSkills();
        ApplyDead();
    }[/code]

now since tuts have to teach you sumin

if ((absX >= 1stXCORD && absX <= 2ndXCORD && absY >= 1stYCORD && absY <= 2ndYCORD is just like non wildy lvls… lol

teleportToX = XCORD; teleportToY = XCORD;
thats where u tele when u die

sendMessage("MESSAGE");

that doesnt need explaining

Read full topic
